Constructor Detail

ExtasysUDPClient

public ExtasysUDPClient(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String description,
                        int corePoolSize,
                        int maximumPoolSize)
Constructs a new Extasys UDP Client.

Parameters:
name - is the name of the client.
description - is the description of the client.
corePoolSize - is the number of threads to keep in the pool, even if they are idle.
maximumPoolSize - is the maximum number of threads to allow in the pool.
Method Detail

AddConnector

public UDPConnector AddConnector(java.lang.String name,
                                 int readBufferSize,
                                 int readTimeOut,
                                 java.net.InetAddress serverIP,
                                 int serverPort)
Add a new connector to this client.

Parameters:
name - is the name of the connector.
readBufferSize - is maximum number of bytes the connector can read at a time.
readTimeOut - is the maximum time in milliseconds the connector can use to read incoming data.
serverIP - is the server's ip address the connector will use to send data.
serverPort - is the server's udp port.
Returns:
the connector.

RemoveConnector

public void RemoveConnector(java.lang.String name)
Stop and remove a connector.

Parameters:
name - is the name of the connector.

SendData

public void SendData(java.lang.String data)
              throws java.io.IOException
Send data from all connector's to all hosts.

Parameters:
data - is the string to be send.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

SendData

public void SendData(byte[] bytes,
                     int offset,
                     int length)
              throws java.io.IOException
Send data from all connector's to all hosts.

Parameters:
bytes - is the byte array to be send.
offset - is the position in the data buffer at witch to begin sending.
length - is the number of the bytes to be send.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Dispose

public void Dispose()
Dispose the client. This method stops the client and disposes all active members of this class. After calling this method you cannot re-start the client.
